alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Clay; Inland St. Johns; South Central Duval; Western Clay (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 23 at 4:46PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern St. Johns, northern Clay and southeastern Duval Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 446 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms capable of producing a landspout along a line extending from near Switzerland to near Starke. Movement was northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts, wind gusts up to 50 mph, minor flooding due to heavy rainfall, and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Green Cove Springs, Middleburg, Mandarin, Fruit Cove, World Golf Village, Sawgrass, Fleming Island, Nocatee, Durbin and Switzerland. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for northeastern Florida.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Clay; Inland St. Johns; South Central Duval; Western Clay
